summary: A brief email from May 22, 2008, expressing gratitude for an update on the Epstein case and offering further assistance. The sender is responding to a call from the recipient regarding forward movement in the case.
keyFacts: An email dated May 22, 2008, discusses the Epstein case.
The sender references a call from the previous Tuesday (likely May 20, 2008) providing an update.
The sender states that 'any forward movement on this case at this point is good news'.
The sender offers to provide further assistance if needed.
The document is a direct communication about case developments, but specific individuals are not named.
